info.title: appsearch
info.description: Mimvi App Search provides mobile app search, discovery and recommendation services.  Based on proprietary biomimetic algorithms, Mimvi App Search delivers the best coverage and most relevant mobile apps, mobile content and mobile products.  Coverage includes:  iTunes, Google Play (Android), Windows Phone 7, Windows Phone 8, Facebook, Blackberry, Web Apps.

get.description: given one app as input, get recommended apps as output

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: optional; same enumerations as search method

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: how many results to return; may be limited by api; deverlopers are responsbile for counting hte number of returned results

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: optional; empty=all; otherwise one of the following:  android, blackberry, facebook, ipad, itunes, mobileweb, windows

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: URL-encoded search query of 1,000 character maximum

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: where to start in the result list, integer
